snippet.title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human Bloody Ties Official Announcement Trailer | gamescom ONL 2022
snippet.description:
Check out Dying Light 2 Stay Human’s first story DLC Bloody Ties, available on PC, PlayStation and Xbox consoles on October 13th. 

In Bloody Ties, you will embark on a new story adventure, you will reach the epicenter of death, wealth and absolute splendor in a stunning new location, The Carnage Hall. This old opera building is full of challenges and quests, surprising new weapon types, character interactions, and discoveries to uncover.

#dyinglight2 #gaming #gamescom #onl
